summary: "The A-Team" was an American TV show that aired on NBC from 1983 to 1987. It followed four former US Army Special Forces soldiers who were wrongly convicted of a crime and sent to prison. After escaping, they became mercenaries in Los Angeles, trying to prove their innocence while staying one step ahead of the law. The show was created by Stephen J. Cannell and Frank Lupo. In 2010, a movie based on the series was released.
title: The A-Team
